info.description: This document describes the TurtleCoin daemon API methods for interacting with it using HTTP requests.
info.title: TurtleCoind API Interface

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License version 3

get.summary: Retrieves information regarding the current status of the node
Retrieves current information regarding the blockchain height
Retrieves information regarding the node's fee for sending transactions via this interface
Retrieves current information regarding the peerlist of the node

put.summary: Attempts to add a new block to the blockchain

schema.description: The hexadecimal (blob) representation of the block to add to the blockchain

201.description: Block has been accepted by the local daemon and will be transmitted to the network

error.description: An informative error message if available

get.summary: Retrieves the number of blocks currently in the node's copy of the blockchain

schema.description: The number of blocks currently in the node's copy of the blockchain

get.summary: Returns the block information for the block with the specified hash

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the block to retrieve

get.summary: Returns the block information for the block with the specified height

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The hash of the block to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves the raw block data for the given block hash

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the block to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves the raw block data for the given block hash

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves the block header for the specified hash

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the block header to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves the block header for the specified height

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block header to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves the block header for top block of the chain
Retrieves the block summaries for the 30 preceeding blocks from the specified block including the specified block

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block to start retrieving at

post.summary: Retrieves a block template for mining purposes

address.description: The target wallet address for the block miner reward

reserveSize.description: The number of bytes to reserve in the block template for arbitrary data changes (ie. pool miner nonce)

difficulty.description: The target difficulty that the resulting block must meet or exceed

height.description: The height of the block the template is prepared for

reservedOffset.description: The offset position in the template of where the arbitrary data may begin

template.description: The hexadecimal (blob) representation of the block template

error.description: An informative error message is available

put.summary: Attempts to transmit a transaction to the network

schema.description: The hexadecimal (blob) representation of the transaction to send to the network

201.description: Transaction accepted and relayed to the network

error.description: An informative error message is available
error.example: Transaction contains an input which has already been spent

get.summary: Retrieves inforamtion regarding the transaction specified

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the transaction to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves the global output indexes of the given transaction

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the transaction to retrieve

items.description: The output indexes of the transaction

get.summary: Retrieves the raw transaction data for the given transaction hash

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the transaction to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieves summary information of the node's copy of the transaction memory pool

post.summary: Checks for changes to the transaction memory pool using the supplied parameters

lastKnownBlock.description: The hash of the last block we know about

transactions.description: An array of transaction hashes that we believe to be in the transaction memory pool

added.description: Any array of transactions added to the memory pool

deleted.description: An array of transactions deleted from the memory pool

synced.description: Is the lastKnownBlock hash supplied currently the top block in the blockchain

error.description: An informative error message is available

post.summary: Checks the status of the provided transaction hashes to determine their status

items.description: The transaction hash to check for

inBlock.description: An array of transaction hashes found in blocks in the blockchain

inPool.description: An array of transaction hashes currently found in the transaction memory pool

notFound.description: An array of transaction hashes that could not be found

error.description: An informative error message is available

post.summary: Retrieves random output indexes from the node

amounts.description: An array of amounts we need output indexes for

items.description: The amount for which we need output indexes

count.description: The number of random output indexes to return for each specified amount

amount.description: The amount of the random output indexes

error.description: An informative error message is available

get.summary: Retrieves the output indexes for the given block height range

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The starting height to retrieve from

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The ending height to retrieve to

post.summary: Retrieves up to 100 standard blocks for wallet syncing
post.description: Retrieves up to 100 standard blocks. If block hash checkpoints are given, it will return beginning from the height of the first hash it finds, plus one. However, if startHeight or startTimestamp is given, and this value is  higher than the block hash checkpoints, it will start returning from that height instead. The block hash checkpoints should be given with the highest block height hashes first. Typical usage - specify a start height/timestamp initially, and from then on, also provide the returned  block hashes.

synced.description: Whether, given the supplied parameters, the node believes that the requestor is currently syncronized

hash.description: The top block hash of the blockchain

height.description: The top block height of the blockchain

error.description: An informative error message is available

post.summary: Retrieves up to 100 detailed blocks for syncing
post.description: Retrieves up to 100 detailed blocks. If block hash checkpoints are given, it will return beginning from the height of the first hash it finds, plus one. However, if startHeight or startTimestamp is given, and this value is  higher than the block hash checkpoints, it will start returning from that height instead. The block hash checkpoints should be given with the highest block height hashes first. Typical usage - specify a start height/timestamp initially, and from then on, also provide the returned  block hashes.

synced.description: Whether, given the supplied parameters, the node believes that the requestor is currently syncronized

hash.description: The top block hash of the blockchain

height.description: The top block height of the blockchain

error.description: An informative error message is available

post.summary: Retrieves up to 100 raw blocks for syncing
post.description: Retrieves up to 100 raw blocks. If block hash checkpoints are given, it will return beginning from the height of the first hash it finds, plus one. However, if startHeight or startTimestamp is given, and this value is  higher than the block hash checkpoints, it will start returning from that height instead. The block hash checkpoints should be given with the highest block height hashes first. Typical usage - specify a start height/timestamp initially, and from then on, also provide the returned  block hashes.

synced.description: Whether, given the supplied parameters, the node believes that the requestor is currently syncronized

hash.description: The top block hash of the blockchain

height.description: The top block height of the blockchain

error.description: An informative error message is available

alreadyGeneratedCoins.description: The number of already generated coins in the blockchain as of this block

alreadyGeneratedTransactions.description: The number of already generated transactions in the blockchain as of this block

baseReward.description: The miner reward of the block excluding any penalties or fees

blockSize.description: The size of the block in bytes

depth.description: The depth of the block in the blockchain (ie. confirmations)

majorVersion.description: The major version of the block

minorVersion.description: The minor version of the block

orphan.description: Whether the block is an orphan or not -- if orphaned, it is not in the main chain

prevHash.description: The hash of the previous block in the blockchain

reward.description: The total miner reward for this block

sizeMedian.description: The median size of the last blocks

totalFeeAmount.description: The total amount of fees included in this block

transactions.description: The transactions contained in the block

transactionsCumulativeSize.description: The total size of the transactions included in this block in bytes

alreadyGeneratedTransactions.description: The number of already generated transactions in the blockchain as of this block

depth.description: The depth of the block in the blockchain (ie. confirmations)

majorVersion.description: The major version of the block

minorVersion.description: The minor version of the block

prevHash.description: The hash of the previous block in the blockchain

reward.description: The total miner reward for this block

sizeMedian.description: The median size of the last blocks

totalFeeAmount.description: The total amount of fees included in this block

transactions.description: The transactions contained in the block

transactionsCumulativeSize.description: The total size of the transactions included in this block in bytes

alreadyGeneratedCoins.description: The number of already generated coins in the blockchain as of this block

alreadyGeneratedTransactions.description: The number of already generated transactions in the blockchain as of this block

baseReward.description: The base miner reward of the block

depth.description: The depth of the block in the blockchain (ie. confirmations)

majorVersion.description: The major version of the block

minorVersion.description: The minor version of the block

prevHash.description: The hash of the previous block in the blockchain

reward.description: The miner reward issued for this block including any penalties or fees

size.description: The size of the block in bytes

sizeMedian.description: The median size of the last blocks

totalFeeAmount.description: The total amount of fees contained in this block

transactionCount.description: The number of transactions contained in the block

transactionsCumulativeSize.description: The total size of the transactions included in this block in bytes

blob.description: The hexadecimal (blob) representation of the block

transactions.description: The transactions contained in the block

size.description: The size of the block in bytes

tx_count.description: The number of transactions included in the block

address.description: The address to which node fees should be paid for this node

amount.description: The amount in atomic units that the node should be paid using the node

height.description: The block height that the node has currently obtained

networkHeight.description: The current observed blockchain height as reported by the nodes peers

alternateBlockCount.description: The number of alternate (candidate) blocks currently in the node's local cache

gregPeerlistSize.description: The number of peers that the node has had issues with

hashrate.description: The current estimate hashrate of the entire network

height.description: The block height that the node has currently obtained

incomingConnections.description: The current number of inbound connections the node has established

lastBlockIndex.description: The last block index (0-based) committed to the local chain by the node

majorVersion.description: The current blockchain major version number

minorVersion.description: The current blockchain minor version number

networkHeight.description: The current observed blockchain height as reported by the nodes peers

outgoingConnections.description: The current number of outbound connections the node has established

startTime.description: The unix timestamp of when the node was started

supportedHeight.description: The current network height this node has support for

synced.description: Whether the node believes it is synced or not

transactionsPoolSize.description: The number of transactions currently in the transaction pool

transactionsSize.description: The number of user-generated transactions currently in the blockchain

upgradeHeights.description: The upgrade heights currently recognized by this node

whitePeerlistSize.description: The number of candidate peers available for additional connections

greyPeers.description: The graylisted peer addresses as a string "ip:port"

peers.description: The candidate peer addresses as a string "ip:port"

transactions.description: An array of transactions in the block

publicKey.description: The public key of the transaction

unlockTime.description: The unlock time of the transaction

paymentId.description: The payment ID of the transaction

inputs.description: An array of the transaction inputs

outputs.description: An array of the transaction outputs

checkpoints.description: An array of block hash checkpoints

height.description: The height to start returning blocks from

skipCoinbaseTransactions.description: Whether to skip returning blocks with only coinbase transactions

timestamp.description: The timestamp to start returning blocks from

extra.description: The hexadecimal representation of the data contained in TX_EXTRA

unlockTime.description: The unlock time of the transaction

extra.description: The hexadecimal (blob) representation of the data in TX_EXTRA

paymentId.description: The payment ID provided in the transaction

ringSize.description: The number of participant keys in the ring signatures

signatures.description: An array of signatures for the array of inputs

items.description: The array of signatures for a single input

signaturesSize.description: The size of the transaction signatures in bytes

size.description: The size of the transaction in bytes

totalInputsAmount.description: The total amount of the transaction inputs

totalOutputsAmount.description: The total amount of the transaction outputs

unlockTime.description: The unlock time of the transaction

height.description: The height at which the input was generated

keyImage.description: The key image of the input

offsets.description: The output offsets in the global chain that were used in the ring signatures

amountOut.description: The output amount of the transaction

paymentId.description: The payment ID provided in the transaction

ringSize.description: The number of participant keys in the ring signatures

size.description: The size of the transaction in bytes

key.description: The one-time output key of the output

blob.description: The hexadecimal (blob) representation of the transaction
